More news

Travel agreement expiry

The termination assistance period for customers with travel contracts under RM6016 will expire on 26 February 2023. This includes access to DigiTS. Customers will need to put in place a new call-off contract through one of our new Travel frameworks before this date. Find out more.

Digital Outcomes 6

Digital Outcomes 6 (RM1043.8) will be available for customers to use from 14 December.

Get in touch

If you would like to talk to someone and don’t know who your local account manager is please contact your regional lead:

  • Alex Byrne: North (North West, Yorkshire and Humber and North East)
  • Matthew Freeman: Central (East Midlands, West Midlands and East Anglia)
  • Andrea Fitzgerald: South (South East and South West)
  • Nicola Rees: London

You can also call our customer service team on 0345 410 2222 or email our customer service team.
